_comment: SCENE TEMPLATE - Copy this file and fill in the fields
_instructions: 1. Replace 'scene_example' with a unique snake_case ID
3. Add lens variants that INTERPRET, don't contradict base facts
4. Add skill-gated inserts for additional details
title: Example Scene Title

text.base: OBJECTIVE ANCHOR: What the player sees/experiences. Short, factual, sensory. Example: The lobby is empty. A clock ticks. The air smells of old coffee and something metallic.

lens.believer: BELIEVER INTERPRETATION: Same scene through supernatural lens. The shadows shift. The clock counts wrong. The smell is death, poorly masked.
lens.skeptic: SKEPTIC INTERPRETATION: Same scene through rational lens. Standard small-town hotel. Old radiators explain the smell. Nothing unusual.
lens.haunted: HAUNTED INTERPRETATION: Same scene filtered through personal trauma. You've been here before. The furniture was different. Or was it?

inserts.text: That metallic smell—blood. Old blood, mostly cleaned, but not well enough.
There's a reflection in the window. Someone behind you. When you turn, no one is there.
The guest register is missing several pages. The dates match the disappearances.

passive_clues.reveal_text: The guest register lies open. Several pages have been carefully removed.
Under UV light, the carpet tells a different story. Someone bled here. A lot.

_tone_checklist.sensory_detail: Clock ticking, coffee smell, metallic undertone
_tone_checklist.mundane_made_threatening: Empty lobby at wrong hour, missing pages
